description: Supplier is required to supply and install an 8ft galvanized chain-link fence and complete with gates, approximately 1km in length around the Parks Canada Compound in Jasper, Alberta. The scope of work includes mobilization, demobilization, supply and install gates. See specifications and drawings for further details on the requirement of this project.

# Tender Announcement: Galvanized Chain-link Fence and Gate Supply and Installation

## Overview

Parks Canada is inviting contractors to submit bids for the supply and installation of a galvanized chain-link fence and gate at the Jasper National Park compound in Alberta. The scope of work includes mobilization, demobilization, supply, and installation of gates, with an estimated total value of between $150,001 and $250,000, including taxes.

## Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0166/A
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-09-21
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-17T16:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-17
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-14

## Technical Requirements

*   The contractor will supply and install an 8ft galvanized chain-link fence, approximately 1km in length, around the Parks Canada compound.
*   The scope of work includes mobilization, demobilization, supply, and installation of gates.
*   The fence and gate must conform to the specifications and drawings attached to the tender documents.

## Security Requirements

*   No document security requirements apply to this contract.

## Bidding Requirements

*   Bidders must submit their bids via fax or email only.
*   Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official submissions.
*   Bids submitted in-person or by courier will not be accepted.
*   The only acceptable email address for responses to bid solicitations is [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca).
*   Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend the site visit.

## Site Visit

*   A site visit will be held on October 3, 2023, at 10:00 AM MDT to facilitate a familiarization of the worksite.
*   Bidders are encouraged to attend this site visit to better understand the project.

## Contact Information

*   For any technical or contractual inquiries, bidders must contact Kelly Nuevo, Contracting Officer, at [kelly.nuevo@pc.gc.ca](mailto:kelly.nuevo@pc.gc.ca).
